title: Emerald and Pearl Chandbali Jhumkas - Pachala Poola Kempu Vontillu
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Classic Chandbali Jhumka design featuring a floral pattern (Poola) adorned with shimmering CZ stones. The central pear-shaped Emerald Simulants add a touch of regal elegance. The dangling Freshwater Pearls (Mutyalu) enhance the traditional charm. Fine filigree detailing around the Emeralds.
occasions: and other special occasions (Shubhakaryamulu). A timeless addition to bridal jewelry.
description: These Chandbali Jhumkas seamlessly blend traditional South Indian design with contemporary elegance. The high-quality CZ stones provide a brilliant sparkle reminiscent of diamonds, while the Emerald Simulants and Freshwater Pearls evoke a sense of classic sophistication. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, they are a true statement piece that will elevate any outfit. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability.
